pages.text: Grants the player Shadow Blend IV (60s), Strength IV (5 min), Resistance III (5 min), Nourishment (10 min), Comfort (10 min)$(br)After consumption, time changes to night, the number of summoned minions doubles (for 5 minutes), all minions permanently gain 10% attack, maximum health, and armor bonuses (up to 5 times), and the minion summoning limit doubles (only takes effect once)

It looks very much like an oversized bean, hopefully the taste after stewing will be similar.$(br)Let's cook it with the simplest broth method, after all, high-end ingredients need the simplest cooking methods.$(br)Stir and heat, let its inherent power and deliciousness be fully released.$(br)But why has it become a strange bubbling green thing?$(br)Fragrant fresh meat? Sweet tomatoes? Crisp onions?$(br)They're all gone, they've all been deeply wrapped by something called night, becoming featureless appendages.

But this is just a disguiseâ€”once you put them in your mouth, their true nature will be revealed.$(br)That surface layer of night will also spread to the entire world with your gaze, and although it's temporary, you can still catch a glimpse of the unnamed authority.
